rowtype.html: <textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Country.." id="country-textarea">%language</textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Full name.." id="country-textaera">%name %lastname</textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Address.." id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Address.." id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="ZIP code.." id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="City.." id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Region.." id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Phone.." id="country-textaera">Phone</textarea>
